I have a LocalDefId pointing at an impl Item, and I can get its self_ty, but I can't work out the right sequence of calls to turn that into the AdtDef for the self_ty - is there an obvious set of hoops I'm missing? HIR seems to be missing a LocalDefId for self_ty.hir_id which is odd as in my example the type is defined in the same place as the impl...

I'm about to go through Ty -> TyKind -> Path -> Resolved -> DefId, but that feels like it's making a lot more assumptions about enum variants than I should be needing to make...
